channel.title: My Character [Idea]?
channel.description:
Ok this is my character so far... Minus the Zammy armor, replace the zammy armor with full guthans. What should I get up besides Combat skills?
[IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/myacc.jpg[/img]
And my hunter is now lvl 54.

item.title: My Character [Idea]?
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

[quote=“zammyking111, post:12, topic:229483”]Ya, I really wish i could get into the god wars dungeon :D[/quote] Then train until you can get in. If you train harder you could make a clan and get a hilt drop. Then you would be set with money.

Read full topic

item.title: My Character [Idea]?
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

Lothy:

Aviansie killing works out well. You get a lot of addy bars, and they’re worth a fair bit.

needs a higher range level tho plus I don’t think he can even get inside god wars dungeon with those stats.

But when your a high level, god wars dungeon, bandits, red chins are all good training.

Read full topic

item.title: My Character [Idea]?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

monkfish are far faster than sharks, and give pretty much the same exp.

red chinchompa’s aren’t good money. i STILL have 21k red chins in the g.e. at lowest, i’ve sold about 8k since last month.

Read full topic

item.title: My Character [Idea]?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:6, topic:229483”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=301886.msg2422925#msg2422925 date=1220444968]
raise your fishing level its 5 and is almost free to train up only a few gp for equipment and then more if you use bait/feathers
[/quote]
Yeah and if you set your mind to it you can easily reach 60 in less than a day.[/quote]
need tonnes of time though…

Read full topic

item.title: My Character [Idea]?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

^^ yeh - as soon as you get to lobbies its really easy xp. I got from 60-80 in about 4 days just fishing lobs. Made a bit as well. Once you get to 80+, sharks come a bit faster and you can easily fish about 800+ a day if you have a bit of time on your hands.

Read full topic

item.title: My Character [Idea]?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Adam:

I’d recommend continuing with hunter. It’s a great money making skill once you get to 63 (Red Chinchompa’s). Also, you can use those to get your range up fast. They got me from 63-81 in 2 days. I played about 3 hours a day and did that.

Red chins are really crowded and slow. If you don’t mind losing some money (but still making alot) do normal chins or red salamanders till your like 70-80.

Read full topic

item.title: My Character [Idea]?
item.dc:creator: @Ford_2_Race Ford 2 Race
item.description:
@Ford_2_Race wrote:

Why don’t you fletch? Your fletching is quite high so you could make a reasonable amount of money if that’s what you’re after.

Read full topic

item.title: My Character [Idea]?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

You’ve got 30 defence levels until you can wear Guthans, so why do you have it? I’d recommend continuing with hunter. It’s a great money making skill once you get to 63 (Red Chinchompa’s). Also, you can use those to get your range up fast. They got me from 63-81 in 2 days. I played about 3 hours a day and did that.

Read full topic
